channel.title: SIM7 - United In Trance
channel.description:
sim7-music.com
Awaken your senses and get lifted with SIM7's unmistakable trademark blend of driving progressive basslines and thrilling synth progressions, combined with melodic breakdowns and lush vocals. ***Become a fan at FACEBOOK.COM/SIM7OFFICIAL***
channel.itunes:subtitle: Official SIM7 podcast. http://sim7-music.com/
channel.itunes:author: SIM7

item.title: United In Trance™ [Episode 41]
item.description: Premiering SIM7's new edit -> Track #8. 41st edition of the official SIM7‘s United In Trance™ show, featuring original tracks and remixes by Max Graham feat Susana, Aligator, Super8 & Tab, Mat Zo, Above & Beyond, and more amazing artists... For detailed track listing and more info, become a fan on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/SIM7official Subscribe to the show via iTunes at http://bit.ly/sim7itunes
item.dc:creator: SIM7
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: SIM7 Guest Mix on 'USTM' Radio Show
item.description: A special, SIM7 guest mix that aired on "USTM" radio show. The set features original tracks and remixes by Headstrong feat Tiff Lacey, Ferry Corsten, Heatbeat feat Jeza, JES, Alexander Popov, and more amazing artists... For detailed track listing and more info, become a fan on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/SIM7official Subscribe to the show via iTunes at http://bit.ly/sim7itunes
